title: EU antitrust complaint against Apple Pay was supported by PayPal
content:
The European Union shared a Statement of Objections earlier today in which it criticizes how Apple restricts the NFC technology on the iPhone to its own payments platform. Now a report from Bloomberg reveals that PayPal was one of the companies that supported the EU’s antitrust complaints against Apple Pay.

more…

The post EU antitrust complaint against Apple Pay was supported by PayPal appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new report reveals that PayPal was one of the companies that supported the EU's antitrust complaints against Apple Pay.
